pullrequest.title: Components Part 6: use ign-cmake1 and components for av, events, graphics

content.raw: I'm under the impression that these classes fail to build on Windows because their dependencies aren't available on Windows. If that's the case, then it's probably safe for us to remove the `EXCLUDE_FILES ${exclude_headers}`, since this component won't attempt to build on Windows anyway.
content.html: I'm under the impression that these classes fail to build on Windows because their dependencies aren't available on Windows. If that's the case, then it's probably safe for us to remove the EXCLUDE_FILES ${exclude_headers}, since this component won't attempt to build on Windows anyway.
